snippet: Among the targets of what police are investigating as possible bias attacks on Sunday night were an Islamic center and a Hindu temple in Queens.
abstract: New York City police say an Islamic center and a Hindu temple in Queens were among sites firebombed on Jan 1; incidents are being investigated as possible bias attacks.

byline.original: By COREY KILGANNON and NOAH ROSENBERG
byline.contributor: Joseph Goldstein and Elizabeth A. Harris contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Among the targets of what police are investigating as possible bias attacks on Sunday night were an Islamic center and a Hindu temple in Queens.

headline.seo: In Queens Firebombings, Sketch of Suspect Is Released
headline.main: Suspect in Firebombings Is Seen in Security Video
headline.print_headline: Suspect in Firebombings Is Seen in Security Video
